scripts.build: npm run clean:build && npm run build:android && npm run build:ios
scripts.build:android: mkdir -p dist && npm run cli -- bundle --entry-file index.android.js --platform android --dev false --bundle-output dist/index.android.jsbundle
scripts.build:ios: mkdir -p dist && npm run cli -- bundle --entry-file index.ios.js --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output dist/main.jsbundle
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean:build && npm run build:dev:android && npm run build:dev:ios
scripts.build:dev:android: mkdir -p dist && npm run cli -- bundle --entry-file index.android.js --platform android --dev true --bundle-output dist/index.android.jsbundle
scripts.build:dev:ios: mkdir -p dist && npm run cli -- bundle --entry-file index.ios.js --platform ios --dev true --bundle-output dist/main.jsbundle
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run flow && npm run coverage && npm run build
scripts.coverage: npm run clean:coverage && npm run test:coverage
